reviews.review: I wanna know how do i keep getting matched up with cheaters. Cheaters that literally abuse in game and have +1k hours. You decide to make your game free, and not get a decent anti cheat. Literally every game someone is cheating, and 0 bans. Your overwatch is as good as your anti cheat? Or this game is faceit only? Thank you :) Great game btw

Getting better at the game is key, there are many modes in which you can practice in to gain some skill. Once you have gamesense and aiming skill you can dominate games and it can be lots of fun.
There are cheaters, griefers, and toxic players but that comes with every single game.
Overall, there's a reason it's so popular.

Nie ma większych patchy które wzbogacają rozgrywkę. Większość nowo dodanych broni jest bezużyteczna. Gra po paru godzinach staję się nudna i powtarzalna jeśli nie masz 4 przyjaciół gra rankingowa nie jest zalecana o ile chciałbyś dostać dziesięciolatka który na każdym kroku wyzywa twoją kochaną mamusie. Także nie polecam gry :) naura.
Good game but a lot of cheaters
